thread.title: Machinima Settles FTC Charges Over Xbox YouTube Endorsements
thread.title_full: Machinima Settles FTC Charges Over Xbox YouTube Endorsements - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Machinima Settles FTC Charges Over Xbox YouTube Endorsements
text:
Machinima Inc., a popular gaming video publisher that helped promote Microsoft Corp.’s Xbox One system, has agreed to settle charges it violated rules about disclosing paid endorsements, the Federal Trade Commission said Wednesday.
According to the FTC, “influencers” paid by Machinima to post YouTube videos endorsing Xbox One and several games didn’t adequately disclose that they were being compensated. The strategy was part of a marketing campaign managed by Microsoft’s advertising agency. The agency was guaranteed that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
